name: mechaniote
description:
(download below)

hello.

this is the story of a broken horse and a friend (me) on a road to nowhere... 

my horse is without a voice. i dont know where it went, or if im making the whole thing up. either way, i need to help my friend speak again. a cassette tape will help my friend to speak. its important to me. very important. i like horses.

this is an epic quest to find a tape.

i cannot promise you much dear player,  only a journey for a voice.

apologies about the download size, my creator is an empty-headed bird :)

Thanks:

  • Meghann O'Neill
  • Maize Wallin
  • T-Dog eXtreme

Created by Nathan Culshaw - https://www.nathanculshaw.com/ - Soundtrack
